schema.description: Response containing correlation statistics for a connector.

average_confidence.description: Average confidence score across all evaluations.

manual_review_count.description: Number of accounts sent to manual review.

manual_review_percentage.description: Percentage of accounts sent to manual review.

no_match_count.description: Number of accounts with no match.

no_match_percentage.description: Percentage of accounts with no match.

review_queue_depth.description: Current depth of the manual review queue.

suggestions.description: Optimization suggestions based on the statistics.

total_evaluated.description: Total accounts evaluated in the period.

schema.title: CorrelationStatisticsResponse
